plugins\/powerFlow\/desktop\/php\/powerF.Activer les logs js sur le widget: Enable js logs on the widget
plugins\/powerFlow\/desktop\/php\/powerF.Info à afficher dans le lcd de l'onduleu: Info to display on the inverter LCD.
plugins\/powerFlow\/desktop\/php\/powerF.Selectionner une commande info/numerique: Select an info/numeric command that contains the ac temperature information.
Select an info/numeric command that contains the dc temperature information.
plugins\/powerFlow\/desktop\/php\/powerF.Commande de Puissance instantanée. (posi: Instantaneous Power Control. (positive = consumption / negative = injection)
plugins\/powerFlow\/desktop\/php\/powerF.Selectionner une commande info/binaire q: Select an info/binary command that contains the sector presence information.
plugins\/powerFlow\/desktop\/php\/powerF.Si vous disposez déja d'une commande con: If you already have an order containing the total power of the panels, you can enter it below.
plugins\/powerFlow\/desktop\/php\/powerF.Le widget prendra en compte cette valeur: The widget will take this value instead of calculating the sum of the powers of each panel.
plugins\/powerFlow\/desktop\/php\/powerF.Laisser vide si vous voulez que le widge: Leave blank if you want the widget to calculate the sum of the panels.
plugins\/powerFlow\/desktop\/php\/powerF.Puissance maximale que peut produire tou: Maximum power that all the panels together can produce.
plugins\/powerFlow\/desktop\/php\/powerF.A partir de 7 panneaux solaire, l'affich: From 7 solar panels, the display of these on the widget, passes horizontally above the loads.
plugins\/powerFlow\/desktop\/php\/powerF.Commande de Puissance instantanée. (posi: Instantaneous Power Control. (positive = discharge / negative = charge)
plugins\/powerFlow\/desktop\/php\/powerF.Puissance maximale que peut produire la: Maximum power that the battery can produce.
plugins\/powerFlow\/desktop\/php\/powerF.Selectionner une commande info/numerique: Select an info/numeric command that contains the charge information (%).
plugins\/powerFlow\/desktop\/php\/powerF.Pourcentage a laquelle la batterie passe: Percentage at which the battery switches to standby.
plugins\/powerFlow\/desktop\/php\/powerF.Couleur personnalisée de l'icône batteri: Custom color of the battery icon based on the remaining charge.
plugins\/powerFlow\/desktop\/php\/powerF.Attention, cette fonctionnalité sera dés: Please note that this feature will be disabled if you use a custom icon or an embedded icon.
plugins\/powerFlow\/desktop\/php\/powerF.Si vous disposez déja d'une commande con: If you already have an order containing the total power of the receivers, you can enter it below.
plugins\/powerFlow\/desktop\/php\/powerF.Le widget prendra en compte cette valeur: The widget will take this value into account if it does not calculate the sum of the powers of each receiver.
plugins\/powerFlow\/desktop\/php\/powerF.Laisser vide si vous voulez que le widge: Leave blank if you want the widget to calculate the sum of the receivers.

plugins\/powerFlow\/desktop\/js\/powerFl.Nom a afficher pour identifier le pannea: Name to display to identify the panel.
plugins\/powerFlow\/desktop\/js\/powerFl.Puissance maximale que peut produire le: Maximum power that the panel can produce.
plugins\/powerFlow\/desktop\/js\/powerFl.Nom a afficher pour identifier le récept: Name to display to identify the receiver.
plugins\/powerFlow\/desktop\/js\/powerFl.Puissance maximale que peut consommer le: Maximum power that the receiver can consume.
